channel.title: GPS on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in GPS on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: How They Make the Mario Kart-Style 'Ghost Car' for Auto Racing Broadcasts
item.description: Watch a Formula 1, Nascar, or IndyCar race and you’ll see a “ghost car” overlayed atop the real-life image. The sensors used to create it also collect heaps of data that teams can access and study.

item.description: Watch a Formula 1, Nascar, or IndyCar race and you’ll see a “ghost car” overlayed atop the real-life image. The sensors used to create it also collect heaps of data that teams can access and study.

item.title: Pebblebee Is Getting Serious About Personal Safety Tracking
item.description: The Bluetooth tracker maker is adding free and paid SOS features to its products, including emergency contact alerts, silent alarms, and real-time location sharing.

item.title: Pebblebee Is Getting Serious About Personal Safety Tracking

item.title: After first operational launch, here’s the next big test for ULA’s Vulcan rocket
item.description: This launch was a big success, but it doesn’t necessarily quash anxieties about ULA’s ability to deliver.

item.title: Space Force officials take secrecy to new heights ahead of key rocket launch
item.description: This will be the first national security mission to fly on United Launch Alliance’s Vulcan rocket.
